content: {A灵光一现}The Luca sapling is close to maturing. Keep watering it with this jar of <style=Highlight>Luca</style>. I wonder what surprises it will bring this time, hoho!

content: Luca is drawn from the vitality of all things. Keep watering the Luca Sapling with <style=Highlight>Luca</style>, and the planet will grow along with it.

content: Keep watering the Luca sapling with this jar of <style=Highlight>Luca</style>, and the planet will grow as well. After that... hoho! Oh, have I got something in store for you!
